about_the_company: Founded in 1975, Salas O'Brien is an employee-owned engineering and professional services firm focused on achieving impact for our clients, our team, and the world. We work across a variety of industries providing integrated engineering and consulting services, including design for data centers, healthcare, science and technology, high-rise buildings, clean energy, education, and more.
job_responsibilities: Obtain hands-on technical experience and apply textbook knowledge to real engineering challenges.
Work with engineer mentors in the design team and take ownership of portions of various projects.
Coordinate with other engineering disciplines and learn how a complete design package is developed.
Acquire time management, communication, and CAD drafting skills.
Apply engineering concepts to real-world projects.
required_education: Currently enrolled in an Electrical Engineering program at a four-year ABET university or college with a preferred targeted graduation date within 1 year (preferred). Will consider interns who are graduating within 2 years.
required_work_authorization: Verification of US Citizenship required upon hire
